get_segments.description: Return audio segments, with timestamps, from model ('segments'). If `true`, this plugin will construct the full transcript by concatenating segments. If `false`, a full transcription will be returned ('text').

whisper_model.description: Determines which whisper model will be used for transcription (must be one of: tiny, base, small, or medium).

steamshipRegistry.tagline2: Just upload audio to Steamship and apply this Blockifier.
steamshipRegistry.usefulFor: Useful for high-quality transcriptions with real-world audio.
